red_channel.docs:
Value of the red color channel relative to the clear channel, as a percentage. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

green_channel.docs:
Value of the green color channel relative to the clear channel, as a percentage. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

blue_channel.docs:
Value of the blue color channel relative to the clear channel, as a percentage. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

clear_channel.docs:
Value of the clear (without a color filter) channel, relative to the maximum value for the chosen integration time. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

illuminance.docs:
Get the total illuminance of the sensor in lx.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

color_temperature.docs:
Get the calculated color temperature of the light in Kelvin.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

integration_time.docs:
The amount of time the light sensor is exposed. Valid values are `auto` (default), `2.4ms`, `24ms`, `50ms`, `101ms`, `120ms`, `154ms`, `180ms`, `199ms`, `240ms`, `300ms`, `360ms`, `401ms`, `420ms`, `480ms`, `499ms`, `540ms`, `600ms`, `614ms`.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

gain.docs:
Set the gain for the internal ADCs to work better in certain low-light conditions. Valid values are `1x` (default), `4x`, `16x`, `60x` (highest gain). Will be overwritten if auto integration time is used

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

glass_attenuation_factor.docs:
The attenuation factor of glass if it’s behind some glass facia. Default is `1.0` means `100%` transmissivity. `2` means `50%` transmissivity etc.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x29`.

*See also: [TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tcs34725.html#configuration-variables)*
